unnormalised: Arre, genetics, you say? My cousin Raju got his DNA tested. Turns out, he's 0.01% Neanderthal. Now he blames *everything* on that – "It's not my fault I ate all the samosas, it's the Neanderthal in me!". Dr. Sharma from AIIMS said it’s probably just an excuse, and that Raju should really cut back on the sugar. Said his triglyceride levels are at 250 mg/dL! Maybe he should get his genome sequenced, see if he’s also part golgappa. Lol!
normalised: Arre, genetics, you say? My cousin Raju got his D-N-A tested. Turns out, he is zero point zero one percent Neanderthal. Now he blames everything on that, "It's not my fault I ate all the samosas, it's the Neanderthal in me!". Doctor Sharma from A-I-I-M-S said it's probably just an excuse, and that Raju should really cut back on the sugar. Said his triglyceride levels are at two hundred and fifty milligram per deciliter! Maybe he should get his genome sequenced, see if he is also part golgappa. Lol!
